pages.text: Soups and stews (for simplicity often just "Soups") are hot liquid foods. They inherit attributes from all of their ingredients, which also determine their names and types. Volumn of a bowl of soup is 250 millibuckets (mB).
Soup cooking perfectly accepts ediable raw ingredients, which will become cooked versions during cooking.
You can add potions into a stew pot so that the resultant would provide effects. Up to three effects could co-exist.
